languages.text: {n}Фраза про мины крепко заседает в вашей памяти. Надо будет в первую очередь смотреть под ноги, а не по сторонам — мятежник или нервный солдат, палящий с трясущихся рук, никогда не сравнятся в убойности с парой горстей фраг-шрапнели, лежащих на десяти унциях взрывчатого фузелина.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Фраза про мины крепко заседает в вашей памяти. Надо будет внимательно смотреть под ноги.{/n}

languages.text: {n}His remark about mines lodges itself in your memory. More than anything, you will need to watch the ground and not your surroundings — you'd rather risk a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier than experience a few handfuls of lethal frag shrapnel resting on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Фраза про мины крепко заседает в вашей памяти. Надо будет в первую очередь смотреть под ноги, а не по сторонам — мятежник или нервный солдат, палящий с трясущихся рук, никогда не сравнятся в убойности с парой горстей фраг-шрапнели, лежащих на десяти унциях взрывчатого фузелина.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}His words about mines lodge themselves in your memory. More than anything else, you will need to watch the ground, not the sides — as far as lethality goes, a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier with shaking hands does not hold a candle to a couple of handfuls of frag shrapnel lying on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}

{n}His words about mines lodge themselves in your memory. More than anything else, you will need to watch the ground, not the sides — as far as lethality goes, a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier with shaking hands does not hold a candle to a couple of handfuls of frag shrapnel lying on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}

{n}His remark about mines lodges itself in your memory. More than anything, you will need to watch the ground and not your surroundings — you'd rather risk a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier with shaking hands, than experience a few handfuls of lethal frag shrapnel resting on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}

More than anything, you will need to watch the ground and not your surroundings — you'd rather risk a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier with shaking hands, than experience a few handfuls of lethal frag shrapnel resting on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}

{n}His remark about mines lodges itself in your memory. More than anything, you will need to watch the ground and not your surroundings — you'd rather risk a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier than experience a few handfuls of lethal frag shrapnel resting on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}

{n}His remark about mines lodges itself in your memory. More than anything, you will need to watch the ground and not your surroundings — you'd rather risk a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier than experience a few handfuls of lethal frag shrapnel resting on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Seine Bemerkung über Minen bleibt in deinem Gedächtnis hängen. Mehr als alles andere wirst du den Boden im Auge behalten müssen, nicht deine Umgebung. Du riskierst lieber einen Schuss von einem Rebellen oder einem nervösen Soldaten, als ein paar Handvoll tödlicher Schrapnellsplitter zu erleben, die auf dreihundert Gramm explosivem Fycelin ruhen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His remark about mines lodges itself in your memory. More than anything, you will need to watch the ground and not your surroundings — you'd rather risk a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier than experience a few handfuls of lethal frag shrapnel resting on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Seine Bemerkung über Minen bleibt in deinem Gedächtnis hängen. Mehr als alles andere wirst du den Boden im Auge behalten müssen, nicht deine Umgebung. Du riskierst lieber einen Schuss von einem Rebellen oder einem nervösen Soldaten mit zitternden Händen, als ein paar Handvoll tödlicher Schnrapnellsplitter zu erleben, die auf dreihundert Gramm explosivem Fycelin ruhen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous notez sa remarque à propos des mines. Vous allez devoir garder les yeux au sol... Vous préférez risquer de vous faire tirer dessus par des rebelles ou des soldats nerveux, plutôt que de subir l'explosion d'une mine contenant trois cents grammes de fyceline.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His remark about mines lodges itself in your memory. More than anything, you will need to watch the ground and not your surroundings — you'd rather risk a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier than experience a few handfuls of lethal frag shrapnel resting on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous notez sa remarque à propos des mines. Vous allez devoir garder les yeux au sol... Vous préférez risquer de vous faire tirer dessus par des rebelles ou des soldats nerveux à en avoir les mains qui tremblent, plutôt que de subir l'explosion d'une mine contenant trois cents grammes de fyceline.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你牢牢记住了他提及的地雷。显然，你最该注意的地方并不是周围，而是脚下。哪怕是冒着被叛军或吓坏的士兵枪击的风险，也比被三百克炸药外加一大把致命破片炸上天要好。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His remark about mines lodges itself in your memory. More than anything, you will need to watch the ground and not your surroundings — you'd rather risk a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier than experience a few handfuls of lethal frag shrapnel resting on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你牢牢记住了他提及的地雷。显然，你最该注意的地方并不是周围，而是脚下。你哪怕冒着被叛军或吓坏的士兵枪击的风险，也不想体验一下被300克炸药外加一大把致命破片炸上天是什么感觉。{/n}

languages.text: {n}地雷に関する話は、記憶に深く刻まれた。何よりも、周りではなく足元を見なければいけない。300グラムのファイセリン燃料を踏んで、一握りの殺人榴散弾を浴びるくらいなら、反乱者や怯える兵士から撃たれる危険を取った方がマシだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His remark about mines lodges itself in your memory. More than anything, you will need to watch the ground and not your surroundings — you'd rather risk a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier than experience a few handfuls of lethal frag shrapnel resting on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}地雷に関する話は、記憶に深く刻まれた。何よりも、周りではなく足元を見なければいけない。300グラムのファイセリン燃料を踏んで、一握りの殺人榴散弾を浴びるくらいなら、反乱者や手が震えて怯える兵士から撃たれる危険を取った方がマシだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Su comentario sobre las minas se queda grabado en tu memoria. Más que nada, tendrás que vigilar el terreno y no lo que te rodea: es preferible arriesgarse a recibir un disparo de un rebelde o de un soldado nervioso, que recibir unos golpes de metralla letal encima de unos trescientos gramos de fycelina explosiva.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His remark about mines lodges itself in your memory. More than anything, you will need to watch the ground and not your surroundings — you'd rather risk a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier than experience a few handfuls of lethal frag shrapnel resting on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Su comentario sobre las minas se queda grabado en tu memoria. Más que nada, tendrás que vigilar el terreno y no lo que te rodea: es preferible arriesgarse a recibir un disparo de un rebelde o de un soldado nervioso con las manos temblorosas, que recibir unos golpes de metralla letal encima de unos trescientos gramos de fycelina explosiva.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mayınlarla ilgili söyledikleri hafızana kazınıyor. Her şeyden öte, çevreyi gözlemeyi bırakıp yere odaklanman gerekecek. Üç yüz gram patlayıcı fiseline oturtulmuş avuçlar dolusu ölümcül şarapneli suratına yemektense bir isyancının veya gergin askerin serseri kurşununu yeğlersin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His remark about mines lodges itself in your memory. More than anything, you will need to watch the ground and not your surroundings — you'd rather risk a shot from a rebel or a jittery soldier than experience a few handfuls of lethal frag shrapnel resting on top of some three hundred grams of explosive fyceline.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mayınlarla ilgili söyledikleri hafızana kazınıyor. Her şeyden öte, çevreyi gözlemeyi bırakıp yere odaklanman gerekecek. Üç yüz gram patlayıcı fiseline oturtulmuş avuçlar dolusu ölümcül şarapneli suratına yemektense bir isyancının veya gergin askerin serseri kurşununu yeğlersin.{/n}
